# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/yargs`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for yargs (https://github.com/chevex/yargs).

# Details
Files were exported from https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/master/types/yargs/v8.

### Additional Details
 * Last updated: Wed, 23 Sep 2020 19:15:30 GMT
 * Dependencies: none
 * Global values: none
